name: solaria-dfo-mcp-v2-minimal
description: SOLARIA DFO MCP Server v2.0 Minimalista (Sin dependencias del Dashboard)

scripts.build:v2-minimal: tsc --project tsconfig.build.v2.json && find dist -name '*test*' -delete && find dist -type d -name '__tests__' -exec rm -rf {} + && find dist -name '*.map' -delete

author: SOLARIA Agency
